name: Delmar's Island
description:
[In Development] Delmar's Island is a  procedurally generated desert island survival game. 

Playing as Delmar, your goal primary goal is to survive, but you'll also want to make your new island a little comfier to live on. 

  • Explore
  • Craft
  • Build
  • Hunt
  • Fish
  • Cook

Oh and don't forget, death is permanent!
